description:
At the Tapella & Eberspacher law firm, we are here to help you find solutions for all the legal issues affecting your life and livelihood, your family, your business and your future.

Serving clients throughout downstate Illinois from our main office in Charleston, the award-winning attorneys at our law firm possess an astounding 100-plus years of combined legal experience, and we have achieved unprecedented success representing the rights and interests of a diverse range of clients with their equally diverse legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury, including car and truck accidents, defective products and other acts of negligence or wrongdoing
  • Medical malpractice
  • Dangerous drugs and devices
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Workers' compensation
  • Estate planning and administration
  • Business law and commercial litigation

At Tapella & Eberspacher, we strive to ensure that you receive the highest level of advocacy and support. As a small, local law firm, we genuinely care about the legal problems facing members of our community, and we will work closely with you to advise you of your options so that you can make the best-informed decisions about the matters that affect you and your case.

Personable and responsive, we are always available to address your questions and concerns as they arise, and we will remain with you throughout all legal proceedings to help you achieve the most favorable outcome possible.

For more information concerning your needs, you can contact the Tapella & Eberspacher law firm to receive a free initial consultation.
